xmp_property.name: name
xmp_property.label: $$$/riff_list_info_schema/property_name/name=Name (INAM)
xmp_property.description: $$$/riff_list_info_schema/property_description/name=Stores the title of the subject of the file, such as, "Seattle From Above"

xmp_property.name: archivalLocation
xmp_property.label: $$$/riff_list_info_schema/property_name/archivalLocation=Archival Location (IARL)
xmp_property.description: $$$/riff_list_info_schema/property_description/archivalLocation=Indicates where the subject of the file is archived.

xmp_property.name: commissioned
xmp_property.label: $$$/riff_list_info_schema/property_name/commissioned=Commissioned (ICMS)
xmp_property.description: $$$/riff_list_info_schema/property_description/commissioned=Lists the name of the person or organization that commissioned the subject of the file. For example, "Domenico Guardasoni"

xmp_property.name: product
xmp_property.label: $$$/riff_list_info_schema/property_name/product=Product (IPRD)
xmp_property.description: $$$/riff_list_info_schema/property_description/product=Specifies the name of the title the file was originally intended for, such as "La clemenza di Tito"

xmp_property.name: source
xmp_property.label: $$$/riff_list_info_schema/property_name/source=Source (ISRC)
xmp_property.description: $$$/riff_list_info_schema/property_description/source=Identifies the name of the person or organization who supplied the original subject of the file. For example, "Macromedia."

xmp_property.name: technician
xmp_property.label: $$$/riff_list_info_schema/property_name/technician=Technician (ITCH)
xmp_property.description: $$$/riff_list_info_schema/property_description/technician=Identifies the technician who digitized the subject file. For example, "Galt, John."
